content: you will need a tapestry needle for sewing up and weaving in the ends pattern suggests a size us 10 5 6 5 mm circular needle 40 100 cm to handle the amount of stitches in the neck edging you will also need 4 buttons 7/8 22 mm each plus a sharp sewing needle and thread for attaching the cardigan is knit in twelve panels they are then sewn together as per finishing diagram it is suggested to label your panels to make it easier to match when finishing finished measurements chest circumference 40 6 47 2 50 5 53 2 103 110 120 130 cm finished length 23 6 23 6 24 2 24 2 60 60 61 5 61 5 cm sleeve seam 16 9 43cm for all sizes yarn used alpachino merino from wool and the gang colour a - magic mint - 1 1 2 2 balls colour b - cornflower blue - 3 balls for all sizes colour c - true blood red - 2 balls for all sizes colour d - pink sherbet - 1 1 2 2 balls colour e - chalk yellow - 2 balls for all sizes colour f - lime sorbet - 2 balls for all sizes
